title: Passenger - Let Her Go [Official Video]
description: The official video for 'Let Her Go', as featured in the Budweiser Superbowl 2014 commercial. Directed and Produced by Dave Jansen. Amazing work Dave - www.funmonkey.com.au Taken from Top 10 album 'All The Little Lights.' - Available now from: Best Buy: http://bit.ly/PSNGR_ATLL_BB (US) iTunes: http://georiot.co/24HJ (Worldwide) iTunes: http://www.smarturl.it/passenger-lights (US & Canada) Amazon: http://www.amazon.co.uk/All-Little-Li... (UK) http://www.amazon.com/dp/B008B8AOQI/?... (US) http://www.amazon.ca/dp/B008B8AOQI/?t... (Canada) http://goo.gl/R0u4w (Germany) *** New album 'Whispers' released in June 2014 and available to pre-order now. head to www.passengermusic.com to order your copy. *** Touring UK, Ireland , US and Europe in 2014 On general Sale - April 25th For all dates in further information on how to pre register for early access to tickets go to www.passengermusic.com *** "Let Her Go" [Lyrics] Well you only need the light when it's burning low Only miss the sun when it starts to snow Only know you love her when you let her go Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you let her go And you let her go Staring at the bottom of your glass Hoping one day you'll make a dream last But dreams come slow and they go so fast You see her when you close your eyes Maybe one day you'll understand why Everything you touch surely dies But you only need the light when it's burning low Only miss the sun when it starts to snow Only know you love her when you let her go Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you let her go Staring at the ceiling in the dark Same old empty feeling in your heart 'Cause love comes slow and it goes so fast Well you see her when you fall asleep But never to touch and never to keep 'Cause you loved her too much And you dived too deep Well you only need the light when it's burning low Only miss the sun when it starts to snow Only know you love her when you let her go Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you let her go And you let her go And you let her go Well you let her go 'Cause you only need the light when it's burning low Only miss the sun when it starts to snow Only know you love her when you let her go Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you let her go 'Cause you only need the light when it's burning low Only miss the sun when it starts to snow Only know you love her when you let her go Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you let her go And you let her go
